title: Yas wind wall needs rework
body:
So was playing vel'koz {{champion:161}} against Yas {{champion:157}} today, and obv most of his moves can be blocked by windwall. but the fact that windwall blocks his void rift is stupid

Active: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that cuts through the ground in a line, dealing magic damage and leaving behind a trail. After a delay of 0.25 seconds, the entire trail detonates, dealing magic damage to enemies standing upon it.

It cuts through the ground ffs
How does wind block a void being generated through the ground??

Riot sort Yas out asap there is so many abilities that stupid wall blocks that it shouldn't.

Also its just wind so why does everything that touches it disintegrate??
The projectiles should fall around the wind wall in a certain radius still doing dmg to anything they hit, its a wind wall not a bloody plasma laser.
This to me is probably one of the most broken things in league and deserves you immediate attn.

replies.body: Yeah but he needs a full rework, Windwall is just one spell and it would be good to see it fixed preseason
thats fine problem tho, its the fact some projectiles don't get blocked is the problem
How about you just stop playing with semantics and forget about the worded description of an ability, and just accept that certain abilities are or are not blocked by windwall?
pretty sure things like zed w vel e tf w which are all labeled as projectiles shouldn't go though and should be blocked
Pretty sure I said stop nitpicking on the wording of an ability description and accept what works.
pretty sure i said, some abilities that are meant to be blocked aren't, so abilities that look like they shouldn't be blocked are
Who are you to decide what is and is not meant to be blocked
A hypocrite if i ever saw one.

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=vuON8Wxy,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-18T07:47:11.152+0000)
>
> Please, explain my hypocrisy

An ability description is exactly that, it's the informations we are given to know what the ability does, the more accurate the description the better we can use the ability. If windwall is meant to stop projectiles but fails to stop certain projectiles, and blocks things that are not projectiles then that is a problem that needs to be fixed with either the ability or the description. If you think it's nitpicking to point out glaring problems then lets see how you like it if a surgeon is performing a life saving operation on you, he's actually been retired for 40years and no longer has a medical license but you're just nitpicking, who are you to decide who operates on you anyway.

ok, if I had been watching this surgeon every day for over 3 years (Yasuo's time in LoL) and knew exactly how he worked, then sure, he could swap my kidneys out!!

Since Yasuo's release, he has had many problems, but Windwall has not been it!

Would you be satisfied if they left the ability EXACTLY how it is, but instead changed the description to say "stops x, and y, and z, but not a, b or c" to describe EXACTLY how it works currently?

I'm still waiting for your explanation of my hypocrisy though
